definition: Baota or Pagoda district of Yan'an city 延安市[Yan2 an1 shi4], Shaanxi

sentences.english: The pagoda has a heptagonal /seven-sided base.
sentences.chinese: 这座宝塔有个七边形的底座。

sentences.english: Then he looked up and saw the girl at the top of the pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 然后他向上看，看到了宝塔顶端的女孩。

sentences.english: Sitting comfortably at number three is Bagan Temple and Pagodas.
sentences.chinese: 排在第三位的是蒲甘寺庙和宝塔。

sentences.english: Located on a hill, a long escalator takes me up to what is actually only the ground floor.
sentences.chinese: 宝塔坐落在山上，长长的自动扶梯把我送到宝塔底层。

sentences.english: Located on a hill, a long escalator takes me up to what is actually only the ground floor.
sentences.chinese: 宝塔坐落在山上，长长的自动扶梯把我送到宝塔底层。

sentences.english: This is Mr.Shen at the Tower Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 我是住在宝塔旅馆的沈先生。

sentences.english: There is a miniature five-story pagoda at the mid-lake pavilion.
sentences.chinese: 湖中有一座小型的五层宝塔。

sentences.english: The temple's most breathtaking feature is a towering pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 庙宇最让人惊叹的地方是一座巍峨的宝塔。

sentences.english: Maksym: The "Pagoda" English meaning is tower. I hope our company is as firm as a tower.
sentences.chinese: 的英文意思是宝塔，希望公司能像塔一样坚固。

sentences.english: His tower can be seen in the background of this early sketch.
sentences.chinese: 从这幅前期草稿的背景中可以看到他的宝塔。

sentences.english: Hexahedral structure makes it looks like a pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 六面体结构，形似宝塔，似有塔灯之感。

sentences.english: On the top of the hill there is a pagoda about five stories high.
sentences.chinese: 山顶上有一座约五层楼高的宝塔。

sentences.english: A dagoba differs from the more well-known pagoda in shape.
sentences.chinese: 这个舍利塔不同于以往我们所见过宝塔的样子。

sentences.english: The utility model discloses a tower self-closing umbrella which is a semiautomatic umbrella with a tower shape.
sentences.chinese: 宝塔自关伞是一种外形似塔的半自动伞。

sentences.english: The lofty pagoda stands like a giant at the top of the mountain.
At the centre of the temple stands a quincunx of towers.
sentences.chinese: 在寺庙的中心，矗立着按五点梅花式排列的宝塔。

definition: glazed tile pagoda/glazed tower of minaret
Jinta county in Jiuquan 酒泉, Gansu
Mt Meru or Sumeru, sacred mountain in Buddhist and Jain tradition/Mt Xumi in Guyuan 固原[Gu4 yuan2], Ningxia, with many Buddhist cave statues
stupa/tower venerating the ashes of the Buddha
Buddhist ornamentation decorating the upper story of a pagoda
(literary) halls (of a palace or a temple)
Hall of Great Strength, main hall of a Buddhist temple containing the main image of veneration 大雄[da4 xiong2]
the Eternal Wheel of life in Buddhism
